flawed_nl_solution:
The team has won 40 x 7/10 = <<40*7/10=28>>28 games out of 40.
There a total of 40 + 10 = <<40+10=30>>30 games to be played.
The team has to win a total of is 30 x 3/5 = <<30*3/5=18>>18 games.
So, it still needs to win 18 - 28 = <<18-28=-10>>-10 more games.
Hence, they can still lose 10 - -10 = <<10--10=20>>20 games.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 30. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
